name: Global Training Aviation (GTA Colombia)
about: Global Training Aviation (GTA), although the query specifies Colombia but the actual entity is based in Spain, is a leading provider of advanced aviation training. As an Indra company, GTA leverages decades of experience and cutting-edge technology to offer high-quality training programs. Located in Madrid, Spain, GTA operates state-of-the-art full flight simulators, including an A320 Level D simulator, ensuring that every hour of training is equivalent to real flight time. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, GTA provides comprehensive training solutions, including type ratings, ground school, and simulation training. Their experienced instructors and rigorous training methodologies make GTA an international benchmark in aviation education, helping aspiring pilots achieve their career goals effectively. GTA is dedicated to guiding students to success in the competitive aviation industry.
